zh-CN.name: 发行名称
tips: 发行名称一旦则创建不可修改
方案中所选上抛将会成为基础上抛
messages: 不能包含空格和以下字符

en.name: Release Name
en.noBasicUpcast: There are no basic upcast yet
tips: Once the release name is created, it cannot be modified
The upcast selected in the scheme will become a base upcast
messages: The release name should be 4-20 characters long.
Cannot contain spaces and the following characters
The version number is in the wrong format!
The release name cannot be empty!
The version number cannot be empty!
